title: raamaa sIthArAma
sahitya:
rAma sItArAma rAma rAma sItArAma rAma rAma sItArAma rAma rAma sitArAma rAma

caraNam 1

 tappu lenna bOtE mAku goppa tanamu rAdu mAyappa daya jEsi kaNDla kappukOni pAlimpavE
   
caraNam 2

 dApulEka nEnu nIdu prApu kOrukoNTigAni rEpu mApanucu dOva jUpaka rAdayya brOva
   
caraNam 3

 nIlavarNa pApamula kAlayamaitini nAdu jAli dIrci bhayamu nIkEla ani yAdukOvE
   
caraNam 4

 vAlAyamuga krpAlavAla rakSincu kanaka cEla indarilO nAdu ceyi lAgiyya samayamu
   
caraNam 5

 itarulandu manasu bOdu veTalu nIku teliya rAdu gatiyu mummATiki lEdu kSiti nevvarini vEda bOdu
   
caraNam 6

 rAma rAma nitya shatru bhIma bhImanuta gata kAma vairinuta nAma nAmadini rAvE
   
caraNam 7

 dEva dEvArcita sarva jIva jIvana mahAnubhAva bhAvaja rUpa shrI bhava pAvana rAghava
   
caraNam 8

 mAya mAyeda vaddurA dhyEya viSayAlEla rOyarO eppuDu dEvarAya rAya I dEhamu
   
caraNam 9

 rAjarAja vandita virAja rAja harE dIna rAja rAja nayana tyAgarAja rAja dasharata
